description: Lexicographically earliest sequence of distinct positive terms with an associate sequence t such that t(0) = 0, and for any n > 0, at least one of t(n-1) - a(n) or t(n-1) + a(n) is a prime number; in case t(n-1) - a(n) is a prime number, set t(n) = t(n-1) - a(n), otherwise set t(n) = t(n-1) + a(n).
